purpose_of_the_server.probleme: Misunderstanding the purpose of the serve

debutant.description: Use serves to set up your attack, and be ready for follow-up attacks unless the opponent does something to stop it.

intermediaire.description: Experiment with different types of serves (e.g., forehand, backhand, loop) to find what works best for you.

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice serving and immediately attacking, using different types of serves and attacks.
